summary: This is a forwarded email from February 2021 discussing the Fing'rs brand, its corporate history, and a speculative connection to Epstein associates via the investment firms Prospect Capital and Levine Leichtman Capital Partners. The sender notes changes to online presences and an unpaid contract.

events.title: Contract with Fing'rs
events.description: The sender states they have had a contract with the Fing'rs brand since 2005 for which they have never been paid.

events.title: Prospect Capital Recapitalization
events.description: Prospect Capital provided $215 million to recapitalize the company behind the Fing'rs brand, which is noted as a portfolio company of Levine Leichtman Capital Partners.

keyFacts: The email speculates that investment firms Prospect Capital and Levine Leichtman Capital Partners, involved with the Fing'rs brand, are connected to 'Epstein peeps'.
The sender notes that many associated with the Fing'rs brand have been 'scrubbing their FB, and canceling on line pages' recently.
The Fing'rs brand was bought by Pacific World Corp/Revlon, was recapitalized in 2014, and has since rebranded under 'Fing'rs Prints'.
The sender claims an unpaid contract with the Fing'rs brand dating back to 2005.
